plot: An anthology series of self contained plays with a murderous theme, the twist being that the action is followed from the point of view of the killer.
plot_en: An anthology series of self contained plays with a murderous theme, the twist being that the action is followed from the point of view of the killer.
plot_es: An anthology series of self contained plays with a murderous theme, the twist being that the action is followed from the point of view of the killer.
title: Murder in Mind
